content.question: The amount of money that the public wants to hold is $10 billion. With a monetary base of $2 billion and a money multiplier of 4, which of the following will most likely occur?

choices.label: The nominal interest rate will increase.
The money demand curve will shift right.

content.answer: The nominal interest rate will increase.

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
